name: Aoe-calc
tagline: Attachment of Earnings Calculator for Council Tax deductions
body:
#Attachment of Earnings Calculator
### _for Council tax in the UK_

The calculator returns a deduction figure based on current council tax legislation. Deductions are based on both net earnings and the number of attachment of earnings orders.

Started as an experiment in php about two years ago, revisited it and migrated to a JavaScript only version using [Knockout.js](http://knockoutjs.com/) as a quick-deploy framework.

Still needs code refinement but the functionality is in working order.

The styling is from Dan Cederholms [Pears](http://pea.rs) and is all contained in style.css

Feel free to reuse for your own needs - only changes required should be in the single stylesheet.

Please contribute if you can refactor the .js into more simple code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
